text:
Arey bhai!
Tere se bakchod banda koi nhi hai poore campus main. Jab hum kaam shuru krte the, tu khatam krra hota tha. Academically to bhut madad kari hi hai, but you are also go-to guy for any type of gyaan. Bahut chill vibes aati hain tere saath. Aur teri blunt honesty bhi pasand hai mujhe. Woh CAA-NRC par debate, aur woh singing sessions hamesha yaad rahenge. I am sure you will do great in life. Hamesha touch main rehna aur milte rehna. Lucky to have met you â¤ï¸ï¸
author: Umang  Malik

text:
Arey Mishra bhai!
One of the most friendly and active people I've seen. Tujhe se AoPS main hi baat ho gyi thi, tabse ab tak poore time contact main rhe. Kayi courses kre, but Parallel aur PoPL ka fraud toh yaad rahega. Tera friendly aur 'dhep', 'aap' krke bolne ka style mood ekdum badhiya kr deta hai. Football fan toh tu hai hi, but game abhi thoda sudhar. Hum logon ka defence nhi tod paye the tum log ğŸ˜›. Aur OpenMP ke chalte toh kafi interact kr liya humne. Tera hall alag tha yr warna aur bhi zyada milte.
Senator banke politics ka experience toh le hi liya hai tune. Ab bas US jake waha par apna plan execute krna hai xD. Uske baad hamare liye bhi koi bill pass krwa dena ğŸ˜›.
Chal aise hi aage bhi chaapte rehna. Milte rehna and All the Best! â¤ï¸ï¸

Pehle 2 saal kafi maze kre humne. 2nd year main toh tera aur Ashu ke room main aake kya hi mast bulla kaat-te the. Class, lab se aake seedha tumhare room jate the ğŸ˜›. text:
Anant Sinha bhai!
Pta nahi kab tera poora naam lene ki aadat pad gyi, but ab maza aata hai ğŸ˜›. Bahut achha time spend kra hai humne. You have been one of the most calm and patient guys I've met. Tere handwash ke toh kya hi kehne ğŸ˜›. Itne saare clubs ka secy banke kya hi surprise kra tha tune ğŸ˜…. 2nd year main mast Mumbai ghumaya tha tune, aur 90 lakh ka toilet ab bhi yaad hai ğŸ˜‚. Pubg se lekar Valorant tk, sab games main kafi enjoy kra hai apan ne. Nightcreeper wala account to ab mera hi ho gya hai lol. Halaki Goa trip sabke liye memorable experience tha, but tere liye toh sabse zyada tha. Woh Whatsapp chats toh shayad ab kabhi na delete ho ğŸ˜›. Not an expert in this field, but good luck here too ğŸ˜‰.
Tera amazon prime to kafi use kra hai maine. 1-day delivery ki aadat dalwa di hai tune ğŸ˜…. Waise sorry agar maine kabhi rudely bol diya ho, never meant to do so. Hamesha touch main rehna and all the best for the future! â¤ï¸ï¸

text:
Arey Ananta bhai!
Hype badhane main toh expert hai tu. Jo bhi krre ho alag hi feel aa jati hai (Woohoo!). First year orientation main jab tere se khulwa rhe the ab bhi yaad hai ğŸ˜‚. Aur NCC wale din bhi yaad rahenge. Shooting krne ka mauka toh mila finally usme ğŸ˜. Bdw you are the first Bengali I met jo fish nhi khaata, still surprised about it ğŸ˜….
Jab bhi acads main koi dikkat hoti thi tere paas hi aajate the sab. Theoretical fields main toh tu expert tha hi. Koi lecture ya assgn samajhna ho toh tere paas turant aa jate. Aage bhi mast research krna, tere papers samajhne ke liye tere paas hi aaunga ğŸ˜›.
Chal aage bhi milte rehna and All the Best! â¤ï¸ï¸

text:

Loco aur cricket bhi yaad rahega. And of course that thermocol plane, jo 10 second bhi nhi udd paya ğŸ˜­. NYO ka kaam (fraud ğŸ˜›) aur bitching bhi yaad hai xD.
Tera jazba to keep trying bhi kafi inspirational laga. Goa trip was so much fun. Aur tune Gujarati food bhi khila hi diya. Hum vegetarians ko ek naya cuisine mil gya khane ke liye ğŸ˜….
Chal aage bhi milte rehna, and All the Best! â¤ï¸

Sudhanshu se zyada tumhe jagaya hoga maine 2nd year main ğŸ˜…. Aur woh TA202 ka project yaad hai? Kya hi dimaag kharaab hua tha usme ğŸ˜­. Waise tumhare Guitar ne mujhe realize krwaya ki meri ungliyaan kitni choti hain. Saari strings cover hi nhi ho pa rhi thi ğŸ˜‚.
Aise hi touch main rehna aage bhi. Aur future ke liye all the best! â¤ï¸ï¸
author: Umang  Malik

text:
Yo Archit bhai!Â Â 
Youâ€™ve been one of my closest friends since first year. SnT code, Odyssey treasure hunt, Takneek E-club our baki activities main mast maze kre the humne ğŸ˜. Antaragni main tera kaam krne jazba motivated me as well (waise woh paise wapas nhi mile xD) . You've been one of those guys who used to enjoy doing your work, which is why it was kinda sad to see you overloaded with so much pressure in third year Techkriti. I remember carrying you on my cycle during all these fests. You are heavier than you look (bhaari haddiyan ğŸ˜›).Â Â 
Second year se toh PUBG main kayi memories banayi. Tere har time flank maarne ki aadat kabhi chuthi nhi ğŸ˜›. Ping968 ke saath khelna aur jeetna made us so happy. I still remember those matches and the hype around them xD. Third year main toh next-door-roomie. We had so many discussions and talks about philosophy, news, politics and life. That's when I came to know about your 'lineage' too. Wonâ€™t be surprised if you wish to enter politics in the future ğŸ˜›.Â 
Lockdown main I really liked your enthusiasm to gather everyone for video calls. Those random discussions, mission to Mars, Skribble and Valorant were so fun. And of course, SCD profile kafi achhi bana di thi tune. Profile bhej dena, hopefully aage kaam aaye ğŸ™ƒ. Aur woh "Who all are here after Archit Awasthi sent them? ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ğŸ‘‡ " wala commentğŸ˜‚.
Waise agli trip saath main plan krna, seedha destination par mat milna ğŸ˜›. Overall very active, hardworking and enjoying-my-work kinda guy who canâ€™t reject requests from people. It was fun to share my IITK journey with you. Aage bhi milte rehna and All the Best! â¤ï¸
author: Umang  Malik

text:
Arey Arpit bhai!
Perhaps of all the people I've met in my life, you've been one of the closest friends I've had. I can't even recall all the memories we've had. From the day in orientation when I heard you are from Champaran (tere Dadaji toh Gandhiji se mile honge ğŸ˜›) to the day we left IITK, its been an amazing journey. PHY103 main second row main sone se ESC201 attendance ke liye subah 7:58 par cycle bhagaane ka mazaa hi kuch aur tha. First year summers main Olympic-size swimming pool ke maze bhi le hi liye. Aur NCC jake Frooti aur Parle-G lene wale din bhi yaad rahenge ğŸ¥ºï¸.
Exams ke beech main aake seedha overwatch main lag jana, just because woh free tha ğŸ˜†. Khali campus main raat main andhera karke Resident Evil khelna, Fortnite main noobs ki tarah harna, Apex, PUBG, aur ab Valorant, bhut games saath main enjoy kre hain. Second year main toh na jaane kitni cheezon par baat ki. Canteen aur mess main toh hamesha saath hi jaate. Roz raat late tak jaagna. Ek doosre ko classes ke liye uthana. Aur teri breakfast krne ki aadat toh alag hi hai. Aur kuch mile na mile, breakfast zaroor krna hai ğŸ˜›.
You've been my go-to friend for everything. Chahe woh Dhim__ ki MLM scheme ho (eBiz ğŸ˜‚), koi news, koi reddit post, koi video game, Pewdiepie vs t-series drama ğŸ˜…, China+COVID ki conspiracies, courses ke discussions, internships, companies & placements, idhar-udhar ki bitching, na jaane kitne discussions kre hain humne. Third year main bhi room ke bahar bulla hi kaat-te rehte the. COVID aane ke baad bhi ye continued rhe, thanks to Valorant and Whatsapp. Goa trip bhi hamesha yaad rahegi ğŸ˜. So many memories made. Aur teri negotiation skills ke toh kya hi kehne. 200->150 Rs ka umbrella (1st year) se lekar 200->140 ki hat tak (Goa trip), your skills have remained the same ğŸ˜›. Woh 6 Rs ki ghadi toh pta nhi kaha gayab ho gyi, aur tera cooler bhi xD.
Aur ab toh crypto main bhi ghusa diya (halaki pta nhi current dip kab recover hogi ğŸ˜…), tips dete rehna. I really like how calm you stay, and how you control your temper, never seen you get too angry. Hopefully jaldi hi fir milne ka mauka milega. I know you will do great things in life. I am glad to share my IITK journey with you. Aise hi milte rehna, and All the Best! â¤ï¸ï¸
author: Umang  Malik

text:

Ever active on internet, be it FB, CC discuss and now Twitter ğŸ˜›. Trips main maza bhut aya. Inter-iit main toh kya hi krke aaye the hum ğŸ˜‚. Thoda careless at times jab interest na ho ğŸ˜…. Smart, hardworking and quick-learner. Aise hi aage chaapte rehna. Milte rahenge and All the best! â¤ï¸ï¸

text:
Ayush bhai!
Initially we met through CTFs and SNT Code. Fir ACA project. Aur Su****** Sir ke project se toh pakke dost bann gye. Privacy breaches aur bitching ke saath uss matke ki kya lete the. Aur fir summers main bina sir ko bataye hi sab farraar ğŸ˜‚. ML, compilers, crypto, sab projects main kya hi bulla kaata hai humne. Mast innovative workarounds nikale. Aur teri 'get-it-done' wali mentaility ne usme kafi madad ki. Jab bhi "python is too slow" sunta hu teri "cythonize" krne ki skills yaad aa jati hai ğŸ˜›.
Those bulla sessions made the assignments pretty fun. Main aur Abhyuday dono timepass main lag jate the aur tu akela hi kaam krta rehta tha ğŸ˜…. Ivanka aur Melania Trump main bhi confuse ho gya tha ğŸ˜›. CAA wali delete krne ke badle tune ye video delete karwa di.
Hardwork aur persistence se tu apne goals achieve hi kr leta hai, aur future main bhi krta rehna. I am glad we met and hopefully future main kuch bada krne ka mauka mile. All the best! â¤ï¸

text:
Yo Vegetarian Bholeshwar Khurana!
Glad to see another CSE gamer. Tujhe online dekhke mera gaming ka regret kam ho jata tha (dekho ye bhi assignment choddke online baitha hai) ğŸ˜‚. PUBG tournament main toh tumhari AOB squad ko maara tha humne. Aur fir next match main tumhari squad main hi khel liya main xD. Valorant main customs krne baki hain abhi ğŸ˜›. Aur last sem main IME course ki toh kya hi next level bitching kri hai humne, kabhi bhul nhi skte.
Tum logon ki shitposting ke toh kehne hi kya. Facebook feed ko alag hi entertaining banake rakha hua hai. Kafi creative laga mereko xD. Poore chaar saal shitposting chalti rhi ğŸ˜‚.
Chal aise hi chaapte rehna. Stay in touch (gamers toh milte hi rehte hain ğŸ˜) and All the Best! â¤ï¸ï¸

text:

Kya hi banda hai yr tu. Hamesha chill aur bindass rehta hai. Full time bakchodi ke mood main. Hum noob gamers ke beech main ek pro gamer toh tu hi hai. PUBG se lekar Valorant tak, sab jagah carry kra hai ğŸ˜…. Ping968 ke matches remain one of my top memories in gaming.
Aise bhi mast chill rehta tha tu. Kabhi bhi canteen main mil jata tha. Cricket main toh badhiya hai hi. Aur RAM ko GPU banake FPS double krne ki technique bhi dhundh li tune ğŸ˜›. Cynamo gaming se Dank Rishu ki streams ğŸ˜‚, Esports tournaments dekhke maze krne se khud part lena, kafi mast time spend kra hai apan ne. Aur 4th year main toh Valorant ne maze hi dila diye. Aise hi touch main rehna. Gamers toh milte hi rehte hain waise bhi. Future ke liye All the best! â¤ï¸ï¸

text:
Arey bhai, tere toh jalwe hi alag hain. Jo skill sab seekhna chahte hain, unme toh tu expert hai. Hum toh bas dekhte hi reh jate the xD. 1st year main alag maze the. NCC, loco, cricket yaad rahenge. Photo main pose kaise dena hai, 4 saal se tere se hi seekhne ki koshish kri hai ğŸ˜…. Cryptocurrency main toh poori wing ko tu hi laya (still Hodling in this dip ğŸ˜­).
Itne plans ke baad finally Goa trip successful ho hi gayi. Woh hamesha yaad rahegi. Got much closer than before. Aur teri conversation strike krne ki skills ka first hand example bhi mil gya xD.
Waise I really like how caring and concerned you are about others. Kabhi gussa bhi hoga toh hamesha follow up krega. Koi pareshani main hoga toh uski help krne ki khudse koshish krega. Bahut achhi aadat hai banaye rakhna. Aage bhi milte rehna and All the Best! â¤ï¸ï¸
author: Umang  Malik

text:
Rahul bhai!
Dehri-on-sone ka seth a.k.a Mota. You've been an integral part of my 4 years here. Mast time spend kra hai apan ne. Bulle se lekar Gaming, sab main bakchodi kri hai. FPS games main toh 'suffer' hi kra hai waise ğŸ˜­. First year main chhupke padhai krta tha na tu? Ab toh sach bolde bhai ğŸ˜›, tujhe pehchaan gye hain hum.
Yaad hai Ashu ko current lagne ke baad kaise gaye apan cooler badalne? Uske 10k kabhi wasool nhi paenge ğŸ˜…. Aur woh Odyssey main Quiz di thi, aur 2nd aagye xD. Ping968 ne toh 2nd year main aag laga di thi ğŸ”¥. Games try toh bahut kre but achhe shayad 1-2 main hi ho paye ğŸ˜‚. Saturday subah ka Dosa ko toh hamesha miss krenge ğŸ¥ºï¸. Kitne nightouts maare hain humne iske chakkar main.
Then covid came and contact with others decreased. But thanks to Valorant, we remained in touch throughtout. Enjoy your Odin-god days till you can ğŸ˜›. Aur Fir apni Goa trip jo hamesha yaad rahegi â¤ï¸ï¸.
The night-long random bulla sessions are one my most cherished memories from IITK. Choti si choti cheezon par bhi discussion kr lete hain apan. Your quick wit and humour always added more fun to them.
Chaapne ki toh tumhari aadat hai hi, aise hi aage bhi chaapte rehna. Lucky to have met you. Touch main toh hamesha rahenge. All the best for future! â¤ï¸ï¸
author: Umang  Malik

text:
Arey Raju bhai!
Pehle toh "Bahut accha aadmi hai yr tu" likhke khatam krne wala tha, but socha thoda lamba likh du ğŸ˜›. One of the most fun and chill guys to be around. Humour aur hype se discussions ka mood high kr deta hai (WOOHOOO!). Pubg se fortnite se Apex se RoE se TF2 se Valorant. Bahut maze kre hain. Wing ka sabse bada streamer (Kilojoule Gaming ftw), aur paw control champion. Woh Pubg tournament yaad hai? Background main OBS ğŸ˜‚. Covid aane ke baad bhi contact main rahe. One of the closest friends I've made. Teri photoshopping skills ke toh kya hi kehne ğŸ˜‚. Aur placements main toh chaapke aaya hi hai.
Ab crypto start kr rhe hain, isme bhi chaapna hai (though starting to kaafi kharaab hui hai ğŸ˜…). Lucky to have met you. Chal aage milte rehna. Aur gamers toh roz hi milte hain ğŸ˜. Future ke liye All the best! â¤ï¸ï¸
author: Umang  Malik

text:
Arey Ritesh bhai!
Kafi chill aur polite banda hai yr tu. Apne zyadatar interactions toh courses main hi huye. But 2nd year se poore time contact main rhe. PoPL, Parallel toh humne kaise hi nikale hain ğŸ˜‚. Abhi last main humne tumhe Football main hara hi diya ğŸ˜› Waise kafi humble hai yr tu. Aise hi chaapte rehna. Milte hain kabhi and All the Best! â¤ï¸ï¸
author: Umang  Malik

text:
Yo Sagnik! NYO days were so fun! Mast cover-up krte the ek doosre ko. SK ke against conspiracy theories, aur reddit par timepass ka maza hi alag tha. Waise fortnite main toh dono hi noobs the ğŸ˜‚.
Aage milte hain kabhi, and All the Best for future!
author: Umang  Malik

text:
Yo Sarthak!
Pehle toh aise hi hi-hello krte the. Fir intern ke time achhe dost ban gye. Kafi discussions kre humne, mostly company/project related hi. '10 minute ki call krni hai' bolkar 40 minute tak baat krlete the ğŸ˜‚. Mehnati aur chaapu toh tu hai hi. Aise hi Tower main bhi chaapte rehna. Aage milte hain kabhi and All the Best! â¤ï¸ï¸
author: Umang  Malik

text:
Yo Discrete Mathematician Sayak Chakrabarti!
Short conversation in cycle stand and canteens se kafi baat kri. Theoretical CS main toh tu expert hai hi. Always been chill but focused kinda guy. Thoda quiet rehta hai, but tum logon ki online shitposting makes up for it ğŸ˜›. Aur lottery ke bawajood we had so many coinciding HSS courses xD. The world cinema course was pretty nice, and those discussions on movies were quiet enjoyable.
Aage bhi aise hi chaapte rehna. Tere papers samajhne tere paas hi aaunga xD Milte rehna and All the Best! â¤ï¸ï¸
author: Umang  Malik

text:
Arey bhai! Had a great time with you. First year ke maze toh hamesha yaad rahenge. PUBG se lekar Valorant tak, bhut bakchodiyan kari hain. Aur raat main Resident evil main kya hi fat-ti thi teri ğŸ˜‚. Random bulla sessions ke toh alag hi maze the yr, woh toh sabse zyada yaad aaenge. Aur tere papa se kitni baar mujhe call aayi hain mujhe hi pata hai ğŸ˜‚, aise hi taal deta tha unhe.
Waise you are of the most surprising people I've met. Jis cheez ke peeche pad gya waha chaap dega, warna aise hi chodd dega. Kayi baar surprise kra hai tune aise, starting se ab tak. Iss khoobi ko banaye rakhna, tere se unexpected cheezain expect krte rahenge. Aur aage toh milte hi rahenge â¤ï¸
author: Umang  Malik

text:
Yo Future Collector sahab!
Halaki ki thoda shaant rehta tha, but mehnati toh tu hai. Pandey ke saath hi tere se baat hui mostly toh. ML se lekar PoPL tk kayi courses nikal liye humne. Collector banne ka sapna poora krna! Milte rehna and All the Best! â¤ï¸ï¸
author: Umang  Malik

text: Yo bro! Lucky to have found a friend like you. First year main Borderlands-2 khelne ke alag hi maze the, kabhi nhi bhulenge ğŸ˜. Bhut dedicated banda hai yr tu, aur hamesha high aim krta hai, aur kuch naya krne ki koshish krta hai. Iss cheez ko hamesha banaye rakhna ğŸ˜. Aur koi trip plan kare toh zaroor batana, I feel bad for not going to Manali ğŸ˜•. Stay in touch and good luck with the future âœŒï¸.
author: Umang  Malik

text:
Yo Sunit bro!
One of the most active, mature and perseverant people I've met. Football toh badhiya khelta hi hai. First year main tune aur Suyash ne hamare PE group ko 2nd prize dilwa diya tha football main (I just chilled in defence xD). I really like how well formed your opinions are related to issues. Video editing ka shauk toh tujhe hai hi. First yea beer main wing video banane se lekar Goa trip main IG reels tak, you'ven quiet creative in this aspect. Swacchta Mitra main I realized how enthusiastic and motivated you were in doing things. Sorry I couldn't help much ğŸ˜…. Goa trip toh hamesha yaad rahegi. Chal aage bhi milte rehna and All the Best! â¤ï¸ï¸
author: Umang  Malik

text:
Utkarsh bhai!
Humare papa apas main humse pehle mil liye the ğŸ˜…. But uske baad se one of the closest friends I've had. First two years to hum dono har doosre month train se ghar aa jate the xD (aur tu ghar se bag bharke snacks le aata tha ğŸ˜›). Aur woh 5 ghante ki journey aise hi discussions aur pichle 2 months ki bitching main nikal jata tha ğŸ˜‚. Diwali ke time North-East express ki bhasad yaad hai? ğŸ˜‚
Apni cheezain mast match hui waise. Aur Bangalore main toh bahut hi badhiya time nikla apna. Fir corona happened and the train journeys stopped, but the rants didn't ğŸ˜…. Finally Parallel main jo hum fase, aur sabki fati. Pehle maine tujhe sambhala, fir tune mujhe ğŸ˜….
Chalo ek saal aur enjoy karo college. Jaise in 4 saal main regularly mile hain, waise hi milte rehna. All the best for future! â¤ï¸ï¸
author: Umang  Malik

text:
Yo Vipul bro!
Cycle chalate huye, canteen/mess main, ya aise hi hostel main hi milke baat kr lete the hum. Kafi chill attitude rehta hai tera, aur chehre par hamesha ek smile dekhkr kafi positive feel hota hai. Bengaluru main toh mast maze kre. Mysore trip was so fun, Coorg trip baki hai abhi. Waise tere daily pushups wali stories dekhke kafi guilty feel hua mujhe ğŸ˜…. Lagta hai workout shuru krna hi padega ab toh xD.
Hardworking toh tu hai hi. Aise hi aage chaapte rehna. Milte rehna and All the Best! â¤ï¸ï¸
author: Umang  Malik

text:
Yo Yash bro!
Another Chaapu in the list! First year main Takneek main hi mile. I still remember those Astro events. Kafi achha laga astronomy explore krke. Uske alawa bhi first year main kafi milte rhe. Waise sorry for disturbing you with those nightouts I had with Tanmay ğŸ˜…. Overall kafi extroverted aur active rahe ho. Always easy to strike a conversation with. PUBG main bhi kafi maze kre. Super active in senate, aadhe emails main toh tumhara naam rehta hai neeche xD. Aur sab courses main bhi chaapa hai. The way you handled all these different aspects of your student life, that too perfectly, is quiet inspirational. Aise hi chaapte rho, milte rehna and All the Best!
author: Umang  Malik

text:
Yugesh bro!
You've had me in awe with how you aim high and work towards achieving your goals. Working closely with you in ESC101, CS251 among others made me realise ki efficiently kaam kaise krte hain. I really like how ambitious and active you are. Multitasking ka toh expert hai hi. CSE Y17 ka toh go-to-person ban gya hai, koi bhi cheez ho, you have the answer. Main khud loud bolta hu, but tu bhi kam nhi hai ğŸ˜›.
Chal aage bhi aise hi chaapte rehna, stay in touch and All the Best! â¤ï¸ï¸
author: Umang  Malik
